snippet.title: Cooking up a scientific experiment
snippet.description:
Features / 11 May 2002
… put his experimental physics to the task. He wanted to make a cake that matched the colour photo of the perfect chocolate gateau on the cover.

snippet.title: Cashing in on the big day
snippet.description:
UK / 29 August 2000
… had a sponsorship deal with the chocolate manufacturers, adding that the photo was one of hundreds taken during the reception. It said: "Ms Turner…
